================================================================
Document Header
Copy and paste this tag in the <head> section of your HTML.
================================================================
<script async='async' src='https://macro.adnami.io/adsm.macro.c5a6bcac-59c2-47f0-ab5e-c1fe1dd18694.js'></script>
<script>
  var adsmtag = adsmtag || {};
  adsmtag.cmd = adsmtag.cmd || [];
</script>

================================================================
Document Body
Copy and paste these tags in the <body> section of your HTML.
Place each tag in the desired location of the associated <div>.
================================================================
<div id="bm-lb1"></div>

<div id="bm-rec1"></div>

<div id="bm-rec2"></div>

<div id="bm-sky1"></div>

<div id="bm-sky2"></div>

<div id="bm-sky3"></div>

<div id="bm-sky4"></div>

<div id="bm-mob1"></div>

<div id="bm-mob2"></div>

<div id="bm-mob3"></div>

<div id="bm-outstream"></div>
